table.name: shipment_accessorial_remark
table.description: Allows you to define remarks to explain why this accessorial applies to the shipment.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The shipment with which this remark is associated.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: The accessorial code related to the remark.

columns.name: REMARK_SEQUENCE
columns.description: The one-up sequence for the remark, to create a unique identifier.

columns.name: REMARK_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The remark qualifier, which identifies the type of remark this is.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
